meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Waldsmith Scott Bergeron Bala Kumar Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7549.

td.p: Sarah Waldsmith, a claims adjudicator from Westerville, Ohio
Scott Bergeron, a business development manager from Norwalk, Connecticut
Bala Kumar, a lawyer from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $33,000)

tr.td: TIM FLIES
TRICKY ANIMALS
WHERE THE LANGUAGE IS SPOKEN
WOOD WORDS
THE NEW DEAL
THE TV "A"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'You could say that in the 1990s Tim Daly earned his these, the title of the sitcom in which he played a Nantucket pilot')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
